field_edited_text.value:
THE STIEFF COMPANY
SILVERSMITHS -:- GOLDSMITHS

Factory
WYMAN PARK DRIVEWAY
Visitors Welcome

Salesrooms
229 N. Howard Street Wyman Park Driveway

ALBERT F. GOETZE, Inc.

BALTIMORE, MARYLAND.
Home of Goetze’s

“QUALITY MEAT PRODUCTS”




THE H. B. DAVIS COMPANY
BAYARD AND SEVERN STREETS

Manufacturers of
Davis of Baltimore Quality

PAINTS - VARNISHES - ENAMELS
and RESINS Since 1898
Catering to the Independent Dealer
No Comnany Owned Outlets

THE NATIONAL PLASTIC PRODUCTS
COMPANY



‘Pemco Corporation was founded in 1910 by
two brothers, Karl and the late Heinrich Turk.
From a humble beginning on one floor of a
small two story house located on Eden Street
in Baltimore, the company has spread, until
today it is the world’s largest plant devoted
exclusively to the manufacture of porcelain
enamel and ceramic finishes and related
products. 5

The Pottery Arts Supply, 25564 Greenmount
Avenue is a Division of Pemco. This Division
supplies Kilns, Clays, Colors, Tools and equip-
ment for pottery making and caters to the
teacher, hobbyiest and professional. The num-
ber 8 car runs directly in front of the door of
this division where these items can be pur-
chased retail. BElmont 6953.

When in Baltimore you are cordially invited
to visit us. f
PEMCO CORPORATION
5601 EASTERN AVENUE
BALTIMORE 24, MARYLAND
Phone, BRoadway 1400



THE DAVISON CHEMICAL
CORPORATION
General Offices
World’s Leading Producers Of
SILICA GEL and GEL TYPE CATALYSTS








Industrialv Baltimore

A strategic location with respect to ﬂmarkets,
materials and manpower, its excellent
terminal, port and transportation facilities,
the availability of favorable plant sites and
complete utility services have brought to
Baltimore great and diversified industrial

growth with unusua! economic stability.



ANCHOR POST PRODUCTS, Inc.
6500 EASTERN AVENUE
BALTIMORE, MARYLAND

Manufacturers of Anchor Fences for the
protective needs of Home and Industry. Also
manufacturers of Fluid Heat Automatic Heat-
ing Equipment for the home and specialized
heating abplications to the marine, truck, trail-
er and railroad field.

NATION-WIDE DISTRIBUTION

s University

i

The Johns Hop



MATHIESON CHEMICAL CORPORATION

BALTIMORE, MARYLAND

Mathieson Chemical Corporation’s plant at
Curtis Bay where sulphuric acid, ammonium
sulphate, superphosphate and mixed fertilizers
are produced. Deepwater facilities permit deliv-
ery of raw materials and shipment of finished
products by water at company-owned docks.



The CROSSE & BLACKWELL Co.
“Fine Foods Since 1706”
6801 EASTERN AVENUE
BALTIMORE 24, MARYLAND



THE BLACK & DECKER MFG. CO
TOWSON 4, MARYLAND
